title: League of Legends.exe Error
body:
Everytime I load into a match I get this error and am unable to join the game. The client works but getting into the loading screen/game does not. I tried re-installing LoL and still nothing. And also tried re-installing DirectX9 and that doesn't work. I've ran out of ideas of what to do, only thing I can think of is a full HDD restore, but I would like to avoid that if possible. Someone please help! This costed me a loss in a ranked D; now I am back down to 0 LP! And I know my whole team probably reported me for leaving the game but It was not my fault and out of my control ;(
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 

League of Legends.exe - Bad Image
C:\WINDOWS\SYSTEM32\d3dx9_39.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc000012f.

replies.body:
This is definitely not something I usually see and seems incredibly rare.  Essentially, it is pointing out a problem with either DirectX or Direct 3D that is not allowing League of Legends to run normally.  It could indicate a problem with your Windows Installation or possibly a problem with your graphics card and associated software.

Before doing a full restore on your harddrive, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists can investigate a bit further and provide some more specific steps for you to take.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following:

1) [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

2) [Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
